summary: Comprehensive testing of SEO Change Notification via Telegram feature. All core functionality verified: Settings page has two tabs (Monitoring Alerts/SEO Notifications), SEO tab shows toggle, configuration status with fallback indicator, Bot Token/Chat ID inputs, Simpan Pengaturan/Kirim Test buttons (Bahasa Indonesia), and example notification format. Change Note input enforces minimum 10 characters with 'Minimal 10 karakter' badge, includes Bahasa Indonesia templates. Fixed a bug where frontend validation used 3 chars instead of 10.

settings_page: Settings page has two tabs: 'Monitoring Alerts' and 'SEO Notifications'
SEO Notifications tab accessible via data-testid='seo-notifications-tab'
SEO tab shows toggle (data-testid='seo-notifications-toggle') for enable/disable
Configuration status shows 'Fallback ke monitoring' when SEO channel not configured
Example notification format displayed with 'PEMBARUAN OPTIMASI SEO' header
Test notification sends successfully with toast 'Pesan test berhasil dikirim'
change_note_input: 'Minimal 10 karakter' badge shown when text < 10 chars
'Detail yang baik' badge shown when text >= 50 chars
Template dropdown with Bahasa Indonesia categories
Add Node button disabled when change_note < 10 chars
bahasa_indonesia_templates: Strategi Linking category with Relink ke Main, Halaman Support Baru, etc.
Perbaikan Cannibalization category with Keyword Cannibalization
backend_api: GET /api/v3/settings/telegram-seo returns settings with configured/enabled status
POST /api/v3/structure rejects change_note < 10 chars with 422 error

bugs_fixed.issue: Frontend validation used 3 chars minimum instead of 10
bugs_fixed.fix: Changed all change_note validation from < 3 to < 10 to match backend

critical_code_review_comments: seo_telegram_service.py: Rate limiting implemented (1 msg per network per minute)
seo_telegram_service.py: Fallback to main Telegram channel when SEO channel not configured
SettingsPage.jsx: Proper separation of Monitoring vs SEO Telegram configurations
ChangeNoteInput.jsx: Well-structured component with minChars=10 default
seed_data_creation: None - used existing test networks and Telegram configuration
context_for_next_testing_agent: SEO Telegram Notification feature fully tested. Settings page has tabs for Monitoring Alerts and SEO Notifications. SEO tab shows: toggle, status (Terkonfigurasi/Fallback), Bot Token (optional), Chat ID fields, Simpan Pengaturan/Kirim Test buttons. Change Note input enforces 10 char minimum with 'Minimal 10 karakter' badge, Bahasa Indonesia templates available. Backend APIs all working: GET/PUT settings, POST test notification. Frontend validation bug fixed - was allowing 3 chars instead of required 10.
